field.name: NoAdmin
field.label: Not Admin
field.description: Never use Google AJAX Library for administrator.

field.name: ReplaceMootools
field.label: Replace MooTools
field.description: Use MooTools.js from Google.

field.name: MootoolsName
field.label: MooTools File Name
field.description: Default is mootools-core.js, MooTools of your site may have a different name, like mootools.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: MootoolsVersion
field.label: MooTools Version
field.description: Which Mootools version to load from Google? Default is 1.4.1.

field.name: ReplaceJQuery
field.label: Replace JQuery
field.description: Use jquery.js from Google.

field.name: JQueryVersion
field.label: JQuery Version
field.description: Which JQuery version to load from Google? Default is 1.7.1

field.name: JQueryName
field.label: JQuery File Name
field.description: Default is jquery.js, JQuery of your site may have a different name, like jquery.min.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceJQueryUI
field.label: Replace JQuery UI
field.description: Use jquery-ui.js from Google.

field.name: JQueryUIVersion
field.label: JQuery UI Version
field.description: Which JQuery UI version to load from Google? Default is 1.8.16

field.name: JQueryUIName
field.label: JQuery UI File Name
field.description: Default is jquery-ui.js, JQuery UI of your site may have a different name, like jquery-ui.min.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplacePrototype
field.label: Replace Prototype
field.description: Use prototype.js from Google.

field.name: PrototypeVersion
field.label: Prototype Version
field.description: Which Prototype version to load from Google? Default is 1.7.0.0

field.name: PrototypeName
field.label: Prototype File Name
field.description: Default is prototype.js, Prototye of your site may have different name, like prototype.min.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceScriptAculoUs
field.label: Replace script.aculo.us
field.description: Use script.aculo.us from Google.

field.name: ScriptAculoUsVersion
field.label: script.aculo.us Version
field.description: Which script.aculo.us version to load from Google? Default is 1.9.0

field.name: ScriptAculoUsName
field.label: script.aculo.us File Name
field.description: Default is scriptaculous.js, script.aculo.us of your site may have different name, like scriptaculous-min.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceSWFObject
field.label: Replace SWFObject
field.description: Use SWFObject from Google.

field.name: SWFObjectVersion
field.label: SWFObject Version
field.description: Which SWFObject version to load from Google? Default is 2.2

field.name: SWFObjectName
field.label: SWFObject File Name
field.description: Default is swfobject.js, SWFObject of your site may have different name, like swfobject_src.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceChromeFrame
field.label: Replace Chrome Frame
field.description: Use Chrome Frame from Google.

field.name: ChromeFrameVersion
field.label: Chrome Frame Version
field.description: Which Chrome Frame version to load from Google? Default is 1.0.2

field.name: ChromeFrameName
field.label: Chrome Frame File Name
field.description: Default is CFInstall.min.js, Chrome Frame of your site may have different name, like CFInstall.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceWebFontLoader
field.label: Replace WebFont Loader
field.description: Use WebFont Loader from Google.

field.name: WebFontLoaderVersion
field.label: WebFont Loader Version
field.description: Which WebFont Loader version to load from Google? Default is 1.0.24

field.name: WebFontLoaderName
field.label: WebFont Loader File Name
field.description: Default is webfont.js, WebFont Loader of your site may have different name, like webfont_debug.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceExtCore
field.label: Replace Ext Core
field.description: Use Ext Core from Google.

field.name: ExtCoreVersion
field.label: Ext Core Version
field.description: Which Ext Core version to load from Google? Default is 3.1.0

field.name: ExtCoreName
field.label: Ext Core File Name
field.description: Default is ext-core.js, Ext Core of your site may have different name, like ext-core-debug.js etc, please confirm.

field.name: ReplaceDojo
field.label: Replace Dojo
field.description: Use Dojo from Google.

field.name: DojoVersion
field.label: Dojo Version
field.description: Which Dojo version to load from Google? Default is 1.5.0

field.name: DojoName
field.label: Dojo File Name
field.description: Default is dojo.xd.js, Dojo of your site may have different name, like dojo.xd.js.uncompressed.js etc, please confirm.
